Name: Collection Quest
About the game: Collection Quest is a story-driven RPG collectathon with an emphasis on the role-play and story. You will have to immerse yourself into the games world in order to progress and unravel the mysteries it holds. Venture forth, engage with its denizens and leave no stone unturned. Adventure Awaits! Features: Rich dialog around every corner Overarching story-driven experience Engaging and intractable world populated with unique characters Filled to the brim with secrets to discover Varied quest and ways to collect all the games relics Retro style graphics with a flavorful bit of modern touches, hmm, Delicious Casual-friendly accessible gameplay with puzzles and story elements that still respect the player Complete controller support, entire story beatable and every secret unlock-able with a controller Local and Remote-Play Split-Screen CO-OP
